attributes.review:
As i was baithing in swamp water next to my daddy shreks house😍, i saw an app that had a giant cheeto on it so i thought i would download it. When i opened the app a really bad odor came out of it and made me gag. I am appalled and absolutely mortified at what i smelled. 

Sincerely,
Shreks lover❤️

attributes.review: So at first I’m like “okay cool the president has an app, let’s see what’s it’s about!” So not even 10 seconds of me opening the app, I literally see a Cheeto smiling, or frowning... I couldn’t tell. Like is this app supposed to be a joke!? Trump has officially lost my vote😡
attributes.title: !!!!!!!!ITS A SCAM!!!!!!!!
